title: Set up A/V for a Meeting
description: An event coordinator needs to ensure the audio/visual equipment is set up correctly for a small corporate meeting.

tasks.description: Review the event booking order to see the client's A/V requirements (projector, screen, two microphones).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the required equipment list.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the in-house A/V technical team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ticket specifying the room, time, and required equipment.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to an available A/V technician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the task to a specific technician.
